name: Mr. HeadLegs
description:
Mr. HeadLegs is a short retro-platform adventure about rejoining with your other half.

Explore the underground and retrieve Mr. HeadLegs's lost head.

CONTROLS (KEYBOARD / XBOX CONTROLLER):

  • Arrows / Pad to move
  • Z / A Button to Jump
  • X / X Button to Shoot
  • C / B Button to Behead Yourself
  • Esc / Start Button to Pause
  • K / Select Button to Respawn
  • Q / Y Button to Quit

All credits to r/Vic except:

  • SFX by FreeSound.org creators (listed in-game)
  • Soundtrack by Komiku (FreeMusicArchive.org)

Developed using Unity 2019.5 and Photoshop.
